unnormalised: Arey yaar, planning a Goa trip? Budget around ₹20000 for a decent 3-day trip. That includes maybe ₹5000 for flights (if you book early!), ₹3000 for accommodation (shacks are cheaper!), and ₹7000 for food and drinks (that's where the real fun is, no?). Plus, keep aside ₹3000 for local transport and some extra ₹2000 for entry fees, shopping and miscellaneous stuff. Don't forget to haggle!
normalised: Arey yaar, planning a Goa trip? Budget around rupee twenty thousand for a decent three day trip. That includes maybe rupee five thousand for flights (if you book early!), rupee three thousand for accommodation (shacks are cheaper!), and rupee seven thousand for food and drinks (that's where the real fun is, no?). Plus, keep aside rupee three thousand for local transport and some extra rupee two thousand for entry fees, shopping and miscellaneous stuff. Don't forget to haggle!
